hero.title: Quantum Vision Filmfest
hero.subtitle: Discover and vote for the most innovative films from around the world

categories.title: Film Categories
categories.narrative_description: Classic storytelling with a twist. Whether it's drama, thriller or sci-fi—If it moves us, it belongs here.
categories.documentary_description: Truth raw and unfiltered. Explore the world, people, and real-life stories through your lens.
categories.animation_description: From frame-by-frame to CGI wizardry—all animated techniques are welcome. Creativity has no limits.
categories.experimental_description: Break the rules. Play with structure, sound, or form. Surprise us with something we didn't expect.
categories.dystopian_description: Near-future chaos, digital collapse, or quiet decline—show us the world when systems fail.
categories.ai_identity_description: What happens when machines dream, or when we become them? Stories about consciousness, code, and humanity.
categories.no_videos: No videos available in this category

about.title: About Quantum Vision
about.description1: Quantum Vision is not just a film festival. It's a creative revolution born from the fusion of film and blockchain.
about.description2: We believe stories should be free—to travel, to inspire, to change minds. That's why we built a platform where filmmakers aren't just participants—they're pioneers.
about.description3: Through a future-ready DApp, creator-owned tokens, and a radically transparent system, we're redefining how films are funded, distributed, and experienced.
